page.title: 18A DAY IN THE LIFE _ AN ADULT
page.content: At about 07.00 I get up and have cereal and toast and tea for breakfast. At 07.30 it's time to wake the baby. She also has cereal, but drinks milk. After getting dressed we have some housework to do: washing up, hoovering, dusting etc. That is usually followed by a trip into the village to buy some odds and ends of food. Lunch is usually at about 13.00 and is a cooked snack. In the after_ noon, I may take my daughter to Toddler Group,swimming or to the park. Other days we go into Taunton to do the main shopping. At about 17.30 my husband comes home from work and we all have tea. By 20.00 the baby is bathed and in bed. Then I put my feet up and watch television,or read a book,knit or do some sewing. I retire to bed at about 23.00.
